original_text: You shall overlay it with pure gold, its top and around its sides and its horns. And you shall make a molding of gold around it.
korean_text: 제단 상면과 전후 좌우 면과 뿔을 순금으로 싸고 주위에 금 테를 두를지며

sentences.original_text: You shall overlay it with pure gold
its top and around its sides and its horns
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 윗면과 옆면 둘레와 그 뿔들을

sentences.original_text: And you shall make a molding of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 너는 금으로 테를 만들어야 하느니라
